name: Occidental Petroleum Corporation
description: Occidental Petroleum Corporation is a major American oil and gas exploration and production company founded in 1920. With its headquarters in Houston, Texas, Occidental is one of the largest oil producers in the United States and operates across various segments of the energy sector. The company has a strong emphasis on sustainable practices and is actively involved in carbon management and environmental stewardship. Occidental is renowned for its innovative approaches in the development of oil and gas resources, particularly in the Permian Basin, where it has significant operations. The company also focuses on chemical manufacturing, producing a variety of products such as polyvinyl chloride (PVC) and other specialty chemicals. Occidental has made substantial investments in renewable energy and is committed to reducing its carbon footprint through advanced technologies, including carbon capture and storage. The company’s mission is to provide sustainable energy solutions while adhering to high standards of safety and environmental responsibility.
